# Choice 2: Recreate Graph

# Load libraries \
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(lubridate)
```

# Clean data
```{r}

homicides <- read.csv("Raw_Data/homicide-data.csv")

baltimore <- homicides %>%
  mutate(city = str_trim(city, side = "right")) %>%
  mutate(city_name = paste0(city,", ", state)) %>%
  filter(city_name == "Baltimore, MD") %>%
  mutate(reported_date = ymd(reported_date)) %>%
  mutate(month = month(reported_date)) %>%
  mutate(season = case_when(
    month %in% c(11,12,1:4) ~ "Winter",
    month %in% c(5:10) ~ "Summer")) %>%
  group_by(month, season) %>%
  summarize(homicides = n())
```
